subject: Public Speaking
title: Why Stories Work
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Why Stories Work.

hook.text: Data informs. Stories transform. The brain processes them differently.

buildup.text: Stories activate emotion, memory, and empathy centers simultaneously.

discovery.text: A fact tells people what happened. A story makes them feel it.

twist.text: This is why TED talks that use stories get 10x more shares.

climax.text: Stories are the oldest and most powerful communication technology.

punchline.text: Tell stories. Brains are wired for them.

quiz.question: Why are stories effective?
options: They activate emotion and memory centers
